vernac_cmds: Require Import PeanoNat Le Gt Minus Bool Lt.
Notation "[ x ; y ; .. ; z ]" := (cons x (cons y .. (cons z nil) ..)) : list_scope.
Definition hd (default:A) (l:list A) := match l with | [] => default | x :: _ => x end.
Definition hd_error (l:list A) := match l with | [] => None | x :: _ => Some x end.
Definition tl (l:list A) := match l with | [] => nil | a :: m => m end.
Fixpoint In (a:A) (l:list A) : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \/ In a m end.
Theorem nil_cons : forall (x:A) (l:list A), [] <> x :: l.
Theorem destruct_list : forall l : list A, {x:A & {tl:list A | l = x::tl}}+{l = []}.
Lemma hd_error_tl_repr : forall l (a:A) r, hd_error l = Some a /\ tl l = r <-> l = a :: r.
unfold hd_error, tl; intros a r.
Lemma hd_error_some_nil : forall l (a:A), hd_error l = Some a -> l <> nil.
Theorem length_zero_iff_nil (l : list A): length l = 0 <-> l=[].
Theorem hd_error_cons : forall (l : list A) (x : A), hd_error (x::l) = Some x.
Theorem in_eq : forall (a:A) (l:list A), In a (a :: l).
Theorem in_cons : forall (a b:A) (l:list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l).
Theorem not_in_cons (x a : A) (l : list A): ~ In x (a::l) <-> x<>a /\ ~ In x l.
Theorem in_nil : forall a:A, ~ In a [].
unfold not; intros a H; inversion_clear H.
Theorem in_split : forall x (l:list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2, l = l1++x::l2.
Lemma in_inv : forall (a b:A) (l:list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \/ In b l.
intros a b l H; inversion_clear H; auto.
Theorem in_dec : (forall x y:A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a:A) (l:list A), {In a l} + {~ In a l}.
intro H; induction l as [| a0 l IHl].
right; unfold not; intros [Hc1| Hc2]; auto.
Theorem app_cons_not_nil : forall (x y:list A) (a:A), [] <> x ++ a :: y.
destruct x as [| a l]; simpl; intros.
Theorem app_nil_l : forall l:list A, [] ++ l = l.
Theorem app_nil_r : forall l:list A, l ++ [] = l.
Theorem app_nil_end : forall (l:list A), l = l ++ [].
Theorem app_assoc : forall l m n:list A, l ++ m ++ n = (l ++ m) ++ n.
intros l m n; induction l; simpl; f_equal; auto.
Theorem app_assoc_reverse : forall l m n:list A, (l ++ m) ++ n = l ++ m ++ n.
Theorem app_comm_cons : forall (x y:list A) (a:A), a :: (x ++ y) = (a :: x) ++ y.
Theorem app_eq_nil : forall l l':list A, l ++ l' = [] -> l = [] /\ l' = [].
destruct l as [| x l]; destruct l' as [| y l']; simpl; auto.
Theorem app_eq_unit : forall (x y:list A) (a:A), x ++ y = [a] -> x = [] /\ y = [a] \/ x = [a] /\ y = [].
destruct x as [| a l]; [ destruct y as [| a l] | destruct y as [| a0 l0] ]; simpl.
assert ([] = l ++ a0 :: l0) by auto.
Lemma app_inj_tail : forall (x y:list A) (a b:A), x ++ [a] = y ++ [b] -> x = y /\ a = b.
induction x as [| x l IHl]; [ destruct y as [| a l] | destruct y as [| a l0] ]; simpl; auto.
destruct (IHl l0 a0 b H0) as (<-,<-).
Lemma app_length : forall l l' : list A, length (l++l') = length l + length l'.
Lemma in_app_or : forall (l m:list A) (a:A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m.
now_show ((a0 = a \/ In a y) \/ In a m).
now_show ((a0 = a \/ In a y) \/ In a m).
Lemma in_or_app : forall (l m:list A) (a:A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m).
Lemma in_app_iff : forall l l' (a:A), In a (l++l') <-> In a l \/ In a l'.
Lemma app_inv_head: forall l l1 l2 : list A, l ++ l1 = l ++ l2 -> l1 = l2.
induction l; simpl; auto; injection 1; auto.
Lemma app_inv_tail: forall l l1 l2 : list A, l1 ++ l = l2 ++ l -> l1 = l2.
intros l l1 l2; revert l1 l2 l.
induction l1 as [ | x1 l1]; destruct l2 as [ | x2 l2]; simpl; auto; intros l H.
simpl; rewrite app_length; auto with arith.
simpl; rewrite app_length; auto with arith.
injection H as H H0; f_equal; eauto.
Hint Resolve in_eq in_cons in_inv in_nil in_app_or in_or_app: datatypes.
Fixpoint nth (n:nat) (l:list A) (default:A) {struct l} : A := match n, l with | O, x :: l' => x | O, other => default | S m, [] => default | S m, x :: t => nth m t default end.
Fixpoint nth_ok (n:nat) (l:list A) (default:A) {struct l} : bool := match n, l with | O, x :: l' => true | O, other => false | S m, [] => false | S m, x :: t => nth_ok m t default end.
Lemma nth_in_or_default : forall (n:nat) (l:list A) (d:A), {In (nth n l d) l} + {nth n l d = d}.
intros n l d; revert n; induction l.
Lemma nth_S_cons : forall (n:nat) (l:list A) (d a:A), In (nth n l d) l -> In (nth (S n) (a :: l) d) (a :: l).
Fixpoint nth_error (l:list A) (n:nat) {struct n} : option A := match n, l with | O, x :: _ => Some x | S n, _ :: l => nth_error l n | _, _ => None end.
Definition nth_default (default:A) (l:list A) (n:nat) : A := match nth_error l n with | Some x => x | None => default end.
Lemma nth_default_eq : forall n l (d:A), nth_default d l n = nth n l d.
unfold nth_default; induction n; intros [ | ] ?; simpl; auto.
Lemma nth_In : forall (n:nat) (l:list A) (d:A), n < length l -> In (nth n l d) l.
unfold lt; induction n as [| n hn]; simpl.
intros d ie; right; apply hn; auto with arith.
Lemma In_nth l x d : In x l -> exists n, n < length l /\ nth n l d = x.
subst; exists 0; simpl; auto with arith.
exists (S n); simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma nth_overflow : forall l n d, length l <= n -> nth n l d = d.
induction l; destruct n; simpl; intros; auto.
Lemma nth_indep : forall l n d d', n < length l -> nth n l d = nth n l d'.
intros [|n] d d'; simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma app_nth1 : forall l l' d n, n < length l -> nth n (l++l') d = nth n l d.
intros l' d [|n]; simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma app_nth2 : forall l l' d n, n >= length l -> nth n (l++l') d = nth (n-length l) l' d.
induction l; intros l' d [|n]; auto.
intros; simpl; rewrite IHl; auto with arith.
Lemma nth_split n l d : n < length l -> exists l1, exists l2, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n.
induction n as [|n IH]; intros [|a l] H; try easy.
exists nil; exists l; now simpl.
destruct (IH l) as (l1 & l2 & Hl & Hl1); auto with arith.
exists (a::l1); exists l2; simpl; split; now f_equal.
Lemma nth_error_In l n x : nth_error l n = Some x -> In x l.
induction l as [|a l IH]; intros [|n]; simpl; try easy.
Lemma In_nth_error l x : In x l -> exists n, nth_error l n = Some x.
subst; exists 0; simpl; auto with arith.
exists (S n); simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma nth_error_None l n : nth_error l n = None <-> length l <= n.
rewrite IHl; split; auto with arith.
Lemma nth_error_Some l n : nth_error l n <> None <-> n < length l.
rewrite IHl; split; auto with arith.
Lemma nth_error_split l n a : nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1, exists l2, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n.
induction n as [|n IH]; intros [|x l] H; simpl in *; try easy.
destruct (IH _ H) as (l1 & l2 & H1 & H2).
exists (x::l1); exists l2; simpl; split; now f_equal.
Lemma nth_error_app1 l l' n : n < length l -> nth_error (l++l') n = nth_error l n.
induction n; intros [|a l] H; auto; try solve [inversion H].
Lemma nth_error_app2 l l' n : length l <= n -> nth_error (l++l') n = nth_error l' (n-length l).
induction n; intros [|a l] H; auto; try solve [inversion H].
Hypothesis eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y}+{x <> y}.
Fixpoint remove (x : A) (l : list A) : list A := match l with | [] => [] | y::tl => if (eq_dec x y) then remove x tl else y::(remove x tl) end.
Theorem remove_In : forall (l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x (remove x l).
intro y; simpl; destruct (eq_dec y x) as [yeqx | yneqx].
unfold not; intro HF; simpl in HF; destruct HF; auto.
Fixpoint last (l:list A) (d:A) : A := match l with | [] => d | [a] => a | a :: l => last l d end.
Fixpoint removelast (l:list A) : list A := match l with | [] => [] | [a] => [] | a :: l => a :: removelast l end.
Lemma app_removelast_last : forall l d, l <> [] -> l = removelast l ++ [last l d].
pattern (a0::l) at 1; rewrite IHl with d; auto; discriminate.
Lemma exists_last : forall l, l <> [] -> { l' : (list A) & { a : A | l = l' ++ [a]}}.
Lemma removelast_app : forall l l', l' <> [] -> removelast (l++l') = l ++ removelast l'.
Fixpoint count_occ (l : list A) (x : A) : nat := match l with | [] => 0 | y :: tl => let n := count_occ tl x in if eq_dec y x then S n else n end.
Theorem count_occ_In l x : In x l <-> count_occ l x > 0.
destruct eq_dec as [->|Hneq]; rewrite IHl; intuition.
Theorem count_occ_not_In l x : ~ In x l <-> count_occ l x = 0.
Theorem count_occ_inv_nil l : (forall x:A, count_occ l x = 0) <-> l = [].
Lemma count_occ_cons_eq l x y : x = y -> count_occ (x::l) y = S (count_occ l y).
Lemma count_occ_cons_neq l x y : x <> y -> count_occ (x::l) y = count_occ l y.
Fixpoint rev (l:list A) : list A := match l with | [] => [] | x :: l' => rev l' ++ [x] end.
Lemma rev_app_distr : forall x y:list A, rev (x ++ y) = rev y ++ rev x.
induction x as [| a l IHl].
Remark rev_unit : forall (l:list A) (a:A), rev (l ++ [a]) = a :: rev l.
Lemma rev_involutive : forall l:list A, rev (rev l) = l.
induction l as [| a l IHl].
Lemma in_rev : forall l x, In x l <-> In x (rev l).
Lemma rev_length : forall l, length (rev l) = length l.
Lemma rev_nth : forall l d n, n < length l -> nth n (rev l) d = nth (length l - S n) l d.
replace (1 + length l) with (S (length l)); auto with arith.
Fixpoint rev_append (l l': list A) : list A := match l with | [] => l' | a::l => rev_append l (a::l') end.
Definition rev' l : list A := rev_append l [].
Lemma rev_append_rev : forall l l', rev_append l l' = rev l ++ l'.
Lemma rev_alt : forall l, rev l = rev_append l [].
Lemma rev_list_ind : forall P:list A-> Prop, P [] -> (forall (a:A) (l:list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l:list A, P (rev l).
Theorem rev_ind : forall P:list A -> Prop, P [] -> (forall (x:A) (l:list A), P l -> P (l ++ [x])) -> forall l:list A, P l.
Fixpoint concat (l : list (list A)) : list A := match l with | nil => nil | cons x l => x ++ concat l end.
Lemma concat_cons : forall x l, concat (cons x l) = x ++ concat l.
Lemma concat_app : forall l1 l2, concat (l1 ++ l2) = concat l1 ++ concat l2.
intros l1; induction l1 as [|x l1 IH]; intros l2; simpl.
Hypothesis eq_dec : forall (x y : A), {x = y}+{x <> y}.
Lemma list_eq_dec : forall l l':list A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}.
Fixpoint map (l:list A) : list B := match l with | [] => [] | a :: t => (f a) :: (map t) end.
Lemma map_cons (x:A)(l:list A) : map (x::l) = (f x) :: (map l).
Lemma in_map : forall (l:list A) (x:A), In x l -> In (f x) (map l).
Lemma in_map_iff : forall l y, In y (map l) <-> exists x, f x = y /\ In x l.
Lemma map_length : forall l, length (map l) = length l.
Lemma map_nth : forall l d n, nth n (map l) (f d) = f (nth n l d).
induction l; simpl map; destruct n; firstorder.
Lemma map_nth_error : forall n l d, nth_error l n = Some d -> nth_error (map l) n = Some (f d).
induction n; intros [ | ] ? Heq; simpl in *; inversion Heq; auto.
Lemma map_app : forall l l', map (l++l') = (map l)++(map l').
Lemma map_rev : forall l, map (rev l) = rev (map l).
Lemma map_eq_nil : forall l, map l = [] -> l = [].
Hypothesis decA: forall x1 x2 : A, {x1 = x2} + {x1 <> x2}.
Hypothesis decB: forall y1 y2 : B, {y1 = y2} + {y1 <> y2}.
Hypothesis Hfinjective: forall x1 x2: A, (f x1) = (f x2) -> x1 = x2.
Theorem count_occ_map x l: count_occ decA l x = count_occ decB (map l) (f x).
induction l as [| a l' Hrec]; intro x; simpl.
destruct (decA a x) as [H1|H1], (decB (f a) (f x)) as [H2|H2].
Definition flat_map (f:A -> list B) := fix flat_map (l:list A) : list B := match l with | nil => nil | cons x t => (f x)++(flat_map t) end.
Lemma in_flat_map : forall (f:A->list B)(l:list A)(y:B), In y (flat_map f l) <-> exists x, In x l /\ In y (f x).
destruct (IHl y) as (H1,_); destruct (H1 H0) as (x,(H2,H3)).
right; destruct (IHl y) as (_,H2); apply H2.
Lemma flat_map_concat_map : forall A B (f : A -> list B) l, flat_map f l = concat (map f l).
intros A B f l; induction l as [|x l IH]; simpl.
Lemma concat_map : forall A B (f : A -> B) l, map f (concat l) = concat (map (map f) l).
intros A B f l; induction l as [|x l IH]; simpl.
Lemma map_id : forall (A :Type) (l : list A), map (fun x => x) l = l.
induction l; simpl; auto; rewrite IHl; auto.
Lemma map_map : forall (A B C:Type)(f:A->B)(g:B->C) l, map g (map f l) = map (fun x => g (f x)) l.
Lemma map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type)(f g:A->B) l, (forall a, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l.
intros; rewrite H by intuition; rewrite IHl; auto.
Lemma map_ext : forall (A B : Type)(f g:A->B), (forall a, f a = g a) -> forall l, map f l = map g l.
Fixpoint fold_left (l:list B) (a0:A) : A := match l with | nil => a0 | cons b t => fold_left t (f a0 b) end.
Lemma fold_left_app : forall (l l':list B)(i:A), fold_left (l++l') i = fold_left l' (fold_left l i).
Lemma fold_left_length : forall (A:Type)(l:list A), fold_left (fun x _ => S x) l 0 = length l.
enough (H : forall n, fold_left (fun x _ => S x) l n = n + length l) by exact (H 0).
Fixpoint fold_right (l:list B) : A := match l with | nil => a0 | cons b t => f b (fold_right t) end.
Lemma fold_right_app : forall (A B:Type)(f:A->B->B) l l' i, fold_right f i (l++l') = fold_right f (fold_right f i l') l.
Lemma fold_left_rev_right : forall (A B:Type)(f:A->B->B) l i, fold_right f i (rev l) = fold_left (fun x y => f y x) l i.

Theorem fold_symmetric : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> A -> A), (forall x y z : A, f x (f y z) = f (f x y) z) -> forall (a0 : A), (forall y : A, f a0 y = f y a0) -> forall (l : list A), fold_left f l a0 = fold_right f a0 l.
intros A f assoc a0 comma0 l.
induction l as [ | a1 l ]; [ simpl; reflexivity | ].

Fixpoint list_power (A B:Type)(l:list A) (l':list B) : list (list (A * B)) := match l with | nil => cons nil nil | cons x t => flat_map (fun f:list (A * B) => map (fun y:B => cons (x, y) f) l') (list_power t l') end.
Fixpoint existsb (l:list A) : bool := match l with | nil => false | a::l => f a || existsb l end.
Lemma existsb_exists : forall l, existsb l = true <-> exists x, In x l /\ f x = true.
Lemma existsb_nth : forall l n d, n < length l -> existsb l = false -> f (nth n l d) = false.
Lemma existsb_app : forall l1 l2, existsb (l1++l2) = existsb l1 || existsb l2.
Fixpoint forallb (l:list A) : bool := match l with | nil => true | a::l => f a && forallb l end.
Lemma forallb_forall : forall l, forallb l = true <-> (forall x, In x l -> f x = true).
Lemma forallb_app : forall l1 l2, forallb (l1++l2) = forallb l1 && forallb l2.
Fixpoint filter (l:list A) : list A := match l with | nil => nil | x :: l => if f x then x::(filter l) else filter l end.
Lemma filter_In : forall x l, In x (filter l) <-> In x l /\ f x = true.
case_eq (f a); intros; simpl; intuition congruence.
Fixpoint find (l:list A) : option A := match l with | nil => None | x :: tl => if f x then Some x else find tl end.
Lemma find_some l x : find l = Some x -> In x l /\ f x = true.
induction l as [|a l IH]; simpl; [easy| ].
Lemma find_none l : find l = None -> forall x, In x l -> f x = false.
induction l as [|a l IH]; simpl; [easy|].
case_eq (f a); intros Ha Eq x IN; [easy|].
Fixpoint partition (l:list A) : list A * list A := match l with | nil => (nil, nil) | x :: tl => let (g,d) := partition tl in if f x then (x::g,d) else (g,x::d) end.
Theorem partition_cons1 a l l1 l2: partition l = (l1, l2) -> f a = true -> partition (a::l) = (a::l1, l2).
Theorem partition_cons2 a l l1 l2: partition l = (l1, l2) -> f a=false -> partition (a::l) = (l1, a::l2).
Theorem partition_length l l1 l2: partition l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2.
induction l as [ | a l' Hrec]; intros l1 l2.
destruct (f a), (partition l') as (left, right); intros [= <- <- ]; simpl; rewrite (Hrec left right); auto.
Theorem partition_inv_nil (l : list A): partition l = ([], []) <-> l = [].
Theorem elements_in_partition l l1 l2: partition l = (l1, l2) -> forall x:A, In x l <-> In x l1 \/ In x l2.
induction l as [| a l' Hrec]; simpl; intros l1 l2 Eq x.
destruct (f a); injection Eq as <- <-; simpl; tauto.
Fixpoint split (l:list (A*B)) : list A * list B := match l with | [] => ([], []) | (x,y) :: tl => let (left,right) := split tl in (x::left, y::right) end.
Lemma in_split_l : forall (l:list (A*B))(p:A*B), In p l -> In (fst p) (fst (split l)).
destruct p; destruct a; destruct (split l); simpl in *.
Lemma in_split_r : forall (l:list (A*B))(p:A*B), In p l -> In (snd p) (snd (split l)).
destruct p; destruct a; destruct (split l); simpl in *.
Lemma split_nth : forall (l:list (A*B))(n:nat)(d:A*B), nth n l d = (nth n (fst (split l)) (fst d), nth n (snd (split l)) (snd d)).
destruct n; destruct d; simpl; auto.
destruct n; destruct d; simpl; auto.
destruct a; destruct (split l); simpl; auto.
destruct a; destruct (split l); simpl in *; auto.
Lemma split_length_l : forall (l:list (A*B)), length (fst (split l)) = length l.
destruct a; destruct (split l); simpl; auto.
Lemma split_length_r : forall (l:list (A*B)), length (snd (split l)) = length l.
destruct a; destruct (split l); simpl; auto.
Fixpoint combine (l : list A) (l' : list B) : list (A*B) := match l,l' with | x::tl, y::tl' => (x,y)::(combine tl tl') | _, _ => nil end.
Lemma split_combine : forall (l: list (A*B)), let (l1,l2) := split l in combine l1 l2 = l.
Lemma combine_split : forall (l:list A)(l':list B), length l = length l' -> split (combine l l') = (l,l').
induction l, l'; simpl; trivial; try discriminate.
Lemma in_combine_l : forall (l:list A)(l':list B)(x:A)(y:B), In (x,y) (combine l l') -> In x l.
right; apply IHl with l' y; auto.
Lemma in_combine_r : forall (l:list A)(l':list B)(x:A)(y:B), In (x,y) (combine l l') -> In y l'.
right; apply IHl with x; auto.
Lemma combine_length : forall (l:list A)(l':list B), length (combine l l') = min (length l) (length l').
Lemma combine_nth : forall (l:list A)(l':list B)(n:nat)(x:A)(y:B), length l = length l' -> nth n (combine l l') (x,y) = (nth n l x, nth n l' y).
induction l; destruct l'; intros; try discriminate.
Fixpoint list_prod (l:list A) (l':list B) : list (A * B) := match l with | nil => nil | cons x t => (map (fun y:B => (x, y)) l')++(list_prod t l') end.
Lemma in_prod_aux : forall (x:A) (y:B) (l:list B), In y l -> In (x, y) (map (fun y0:B => (x, y0)) l).
induction l; [ simpl; auto | simpl; destruct 1 as [H1| ]; [ left; rewrite H1; trivial | right; auto ] ].
Lemma in_prod : forall (l:list A) (l':list B) (x:A) (y:B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l').
induction l; [ simpl; tauto | simpl; intros; apply in_or_app; destruct H; [ left; rewrite H; apply in_prod_aux; assumption | right; auto ] ].
Lemma in_prod_iff : forall (l:list A)(l':list B)(x:A)(y:B), In (x,y) (list_prod l l') <-> In x l /\ In y l'.
destruct (in_map_iff (fun y : B => (a, y)) l' (x,y)) as (H1,_).
destruct (H1 H0) as (z,(H2,H3)); clear H0 H1.
Lemma prod_length : forall (l:list A)(l':list B), length (list_prod l l') = (length l) * (length l').
Definition lel (l m:list A) := length l <= length m.
Variables l m n : list A.
Lemma lel_trans : lel l m -> lel m n -> lel l n.
apply le_trans with (length m); auto with arith.
Lemma lel_cons_cons : lel l m -> lel (a :: l) (b :: m).
unfold lel; simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma lel_cons : lel l m -> lel l (b :: m).
unfold lel; simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma lel_tail : lel (a :: l) (b :: m) -> lel l m.
unfold lel; simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma lel_nil : forall l':list A, lel l' nil -> nil = l'.
intro l'; elim l'; auto with arith.
Hint Resolve lel_refl lel_cons_cons lel_cons lel_nil lel_nil nil_cons: datatypes.
Definition incl (l m:list A) := forall a:A, In a l -> In a m.
Lemma incl_refl : forall l:list A, incl l l.
Lemma incl_tl : forall (a:A) (l m:list A), incl l m -> incl l (a :: m).
Lemma incl_tran : forall l m n:list A, incl l m -> incl m n -> incl l n.
Lemma incl_appl : forall l m n:list A, incl l n -> incl l (n ++ m).
Lemma incl_appr : forall l m n:list A, incl l n -> incl l (m ++ n).
Lemma incl_cons : forall (a:A) (l m:list A), In a m -> incl l m -> incl (a :: l) m.
unfold incl; simpl; intros a l m H H0 a0 H1.
now_show (In a0 l -> In a0 m).
Lemma incl_app : forall l m n:list A, incl l n -> incl m n -> incl (l ++ m) n.
unfold incl; simpl; intros l m n H H0 a H1.
Hint Resolve incl_refl incl_tl incl_tran incl_appl incl_appr incl_cons incl_app: datatypes.
Fixpoint firstn (n:nat)(l:list A) : list A := match n with | 0 => nil | S n => match l with | nil => nil | a::l => a::(firstn n l) end end.
Lemma firstn_cons n a l: firstn (S n) (a::l) = a :: (firstn n l).
Lemma firstn_all l: firstn (length l) l = l.
induction l as [| ? ? H]; simpl; [reflexivity | now rewrite H].
Lemma firstn_all2 n: forall (l:list A), (length l) <= n -> firstn n l = l.
Lemma firstn_le_length n: forall l:list A, length (firstn n l) <= n.
induction n as [|k iHk]; simpl; [auto | destruct l as [|x xs]; simpl].
Lemma firstn_length_le: forall l:list A, forall n:nat, n <= length l -> length (firstn n l) = n.
Lemma firstn_app n: forall l1 l2, firstn n (l1 ++ l2) = (firstn n l1) ++ (firstn (n - length l1) l2).
induction n as [|k iHk]; intros l1 l2.
Lemma firstn_app_2 n: forall l1 l2, firstn ((length l1) + n) (l1 ++ l2) = l1 ++ firstn n l2.
induction n as [| k iHk];intros l1 l2.
assert (H0 : (length l1 + S k - length l1) = S k).
rewrite H0, firstn_all2; [reflexivity | auto with arith].
Lemma firstn_firstn: forall l:list A, forall i j : nat, firstn i (firstn j l) = firstn (min i j) l.
Fixpoint skipn (n:nat)(l:list A) : list A := match n with | 0 => l | S n => match l with | nil => nil | a::l => skipn n l end end.
Lemma firstn_skipn : forall n l, firstn n l ++ skipn n l = l.
Lemma firstn_length : forall n l, length (firstn n l) = min n (length l).
induction n; destruct l; simpl; auto.
Lemma removelast_firstn : forall n l, n < length l -> removelast (firstn (S n) l) = firstn n l.
clear IHn; destruct l; simpl in *; try discriminate.
Lemma firstn_removelast : forall n l, n < length l -> firstn n (removelast l) = firstn n l.
intro H0; rewrite H0 in H; inversion_clear H; inversion_clear H1.
Inductive Add (a:A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := | Add_head l : Add a l (a::l) | Add_cons x l l' : Add a l l' -> Add a (x::l) (x::l').
Lemma Add_app a l1 l2 : Add a (l1++l2) (l1++a::l2).
Lemma Add_split a l l' : Add a l l' -> exists l1 l2, l = l1++l2 /\ l' = l1++a::l2.
exists nil; exists l; split; trivial.
destruct IHAdd as (l1 & l2 & Hl & Hl').
exists (x::l1); exists l2; split; simpl; f_equal; trivial.
Lemma Add_in a l l' : Add a l l' -> forall x, In x l' <-> In x (a::l).
induction 1; intros; simpl in *; rewrite ?IHAdd; tauto.
Lemma Add_length a l l' : Add a l l' -> length l' = S (length l).
Lemma Add_inv a l : In a l -> exists l', Add a l' l.
Lemma incl_Add_inv a l u v : ~In a l -> incl (a::l) v -> Add a u v -> incl l u.
intros Ha H AD y Hy.
destruct Hy'; [ subst; now elim Ha | trivial ].
Inductive NoDup : list A -> Prop := | NoDup_nil : NoDup nil | NoDup_cons : forall x l, ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x::l).
Lemma NoDup_Add a l l' : Add a l l' -> (NoDup l' <-> NoDup l /\ ~In a l).
induction 1 as [l|x l l' AD IH].
split; [ inversion_clear 1; now split | now constructor ].
simpl in *; split; try constructor; intuition.
Lemma NoDup_remove l l' a : NoDup (l++a::l') -> NoDup (l++l') /\ ~In a (l++l').
Lemma NoDup_remove_1 l l' a : NoDup (l++a::l') -> NoDup (l++l').
Lemma NoDup_remove_2 l l' a : NoDup (l++a::l') -> ~In a (l++l').
Theorem NoDup_cons_iff a l: NoDup (a::l) <-> ~ In a l /\ NoDup l.
Hypothesis decA: forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}.
Fixpoint nodup (l : list A) : list A := match l with | [] => [] | x::xs => if in_dec decA x xs then nodup xs else x::(nodup xs) end.
Lemma nodup_In l x : In x (nodup l) <-> In x l.
induction l as [|a l' Hrec]; simpl.
destruct (in_dec decA a l'); simpl; rewrite Hrec.
induction l as [|a l' Hrec]; simpl.
Lemma nodup_inv k l a : nodup k = a :: l -> ~ In a l.
Theorem NoDup_count_occ l: NoDup l <-> (forall x:A, count_occ decA l x <= 1).
induction l as [| a l' Hrec].
Theorem NoDup_count_occ' l: NoDup l <-> (forall x:A, In x l -> count_occ decA l x = 1).
split; intros H x; specialize (H x); set (n := count_occ decA l x) in *; clearbody n.
Lemma NoDup_nth_error l : NoDup l <-> (forall i j, i<length l -> nth_error l i = nth_error l j -> i = j).
intros H; induction H as [|a l Hal Hl IH]; intros i j Hi E.
destruct i, j; simpl in *; auto.
induction l as [|a l]; intros H; constructor.
assert (n < length l) by (now rewrite <- nth_error_Some, Hn).
apply eq_add_S, H; simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma NoDup_nth l d : NoDup l <-> (forall i j, i<length l -> j<length l -> nth i l d = nth j l d -> i = j).
intros H; induction H as [|a l Hal Hl IH]; intros i j Hi Hj E.
destruct i, j; simpl in *; auto.
induction l as [|a l]; intros H; constructor.
intros i j Hi Hj E.
apply eq_add_S, H; simpl; auto with arith.
Lemma NoDup_incl_length l l' : NoDup l -> incl l l' -> length l <= length l'.
induction N as [|a l Hal N IH]; simpl.
now apply incl_Add_inv with a l'.
Lemma NoDup_length_incl l l' : NoDup l -> length l' <= length l -> incl l l' -> incl l' l.
induction N as [|a l Hal N IH].
intros l' E H x Hx.
now apply incl_Add_inv with a l'.
Lemma NoDup_map_inv A B (f:A->B) l : NoDup (map f l) -> NoDup l.
induction l; simpl; inversion_clear 1; subst; constructor; auto.
Fixpoint seq (start len:nat) : list nat := match len with | 0 => nil | S len => start :: seq (S start) len end.
Lemma seq_length : forall len start, length (seq start len) = len.
Lemma seq_nth : forall len start n d, n < len -> nth n (seq start len) d = start+n.
Lemma seq_shift : forall len start, map S (seq start len) = seq (S start) len.
Lemma in_seq len start n : In n (seq start len) <-> start <= n < start+len.
intros [H|H]; subst; intuition auto with arith.
Lemma seq_NoDup len start : NoDup (seq start len).
revert start; induction len; simpl; constructor; trivial.
Inductive Exists : list A -> Prop := | Exists_cons_hd : forall x l, P x -> Exists (x::l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall x l, Exists l -> Exists (x::l).
Lemma Exists_exists (l:list A) : Exists l <-> (exists x, In x l /\ P x).
Lemma Exists_cons x l: Exists (x::l) <-> P x \/ Exists l.
Lemma Exists_dec l: (forall x:A, {P x} + { ~ P x }) -> {Exists l} + {~ Exists l}.
Inductive Forall : list A -> Prop := | Forall_nil : Forall nil | Forall_cons : forall x l, P x -> Forall l -> Forall (x::l).
Lemma Forall_forall (l:list A): Forall l <-> (forall x, In x l -> P x).
Lemma Forall_inv : forall (a:A) l, Forall (a :: l) -> P a.
Lemma Forall_rect : forall (Q : list A -> Type), Q [] -> (forall b l, P b -> Q (b :: l)) -> forall l, Forall l -> Q l.
intros Q H H'; induction l; intro; [|eapply H', Forall_inv]; eassumption.
Lemma Forall_dec : (forall x:A, {P x} + { ~ P x }) -> forall l:list A, {Forall l} + {~ Forall l}.
Lemma Forall_Exists_neg (P:A->Prop)(l:list A) : Forall (fun x => ~ P x) l <-> ~(Exists P l).
Lemma Exists_Forall_neg (P:A->Prop)(l:list A) : (forall x, P x \/ ~P x) -> Exists (fun x => ~ P x) l <-> ~(Forall P l).
Lemma neg_Forall_Exists_neg (P:A->Prop) (l:list A) : (forall x:A, {P x} + { ~ P x }) -> ~ Forall P l -> Exists (fun x => ~ P x) l.
Lemma Forall_Exists_dec (P:A->Prop) : (forall x:A, {P x} + { ~ P x }) -> forall l:list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists (fun x => ~ P x) l}.
Lemma Forall_impl : forall (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall a, P a -> Q a) -> forall l, Forall P l -> Forall Q l.
Inductive Forall2 : list A -> list B -> Prop := | Forall2_nil : Forall2 [] [] | Forall2_cons : forall x y l l', R x y -> Forall2 l l' -> Forall2 (x::l) (y::l').
Theorem Forall2_app_inv_l : forall l1 l2 l', Forall2 (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2', Forall2 l1 l1' /\ Forall2 l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'.
simpl in H; inversion H; subst; clear H.
apply IHl1 in H4 as (l1' & l2' & Hl1 & Hl2 & ->).
Theorem Forall2_app_inv_r : forall l1' l2' l, Forall2 l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2, Forall2 l1 l1' /\ Forall2 l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2.
simpl in H; inversion H; subst; clear H.
apply IHl1' in H4 as (l1 & l2 & Hl1 & Hl2 & ->).
Theorem Forall2_app : forall l1 l2 l1' l2', Forall2 l1 l1' -> Forall2 l2 l2' -> Forall2 (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2').
induction l1 in l1', H, H0 |- *; inversion H; subst; simpl; auto.
Definition ForallPairs l := forall a b, In a l -> In b l -> R a b.
Inductive ForallOrdPairs : list A -> Prop := | FOP_nil : ForallOrdPairs nil | FOP_cons : forall a l, Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs l -> ForallOrdPairs (a::l).
Lemma ForallOrdPairs_In : forall l, ForallOrdPairs l -> forall x y, In x l -> In y l -> x=y \/ R x y \/ R y x.
Lemma ForallPairs_ForallOrdPairs l: ForallPairs l -> ForallOrdPairs l.
red; intros; apply H; simpl; auto.
Lemma ForallOrdPairs_ForallPairs : (forall x, R x x) -> (forall x y, R x y -> R y x) -> forall l, ForallOrdPairs l -> ForallPairs l.
intros Refl Sym l Hl x y Hx Hy.
destruct (ForallOrdPairs_In Hl _ _ Hx Hy); subst; intuition.
Ltac is_list_constr c := match c with | nil => idtac | (_::_) => idtac | _ => fail end.

Ltac invlist f := match goal with | H:f ?l |- _ => is_list_constr l; inversion_clear H; invlist f | H:f _ ?l |- _ => is_list_constr l; inversion_clear H; invlist f | H:f _ _ ?l |- _ => is_list_constr l; inversion_clear H; invlist f | H:f _ _ _ ?l |- _ => is_list_constr l; inversion_clear H; invlist f | H:f _ _ _ _ ?l |- _ => is_list_constr l; inversion_clear H; invlist f | _ => idtac end.
Hint Rewrite rev_involutive rev_unit map_nth map_length seq_length app_length rev_length app_nil_r : list.
Ltac ssimpl_list := autorewrite with list using simpl.
Fixpoint repeat (x : A) (n: nat ) := match n with | O => [] | S k => x::(repeat x k) end.
Theorem repeat_length x n: length (repeat x n) = n.
induction n as [| k Hrec]; simpl; rewrite ?Hrec; reflexivity.
Theorem repeat_spec n x y: In y (repeat x n) -> y=x.
induction n as [|k Hrec]; simpl; destruct 1; auto.
